WorkItem.Description: When I'm exporting gear lists to .csv format the file opened in excel is not csv but similar to that where the data is just copied to the clipboard. Excel doesn't seem to be recognising the file format

Comments.Message: This is a normal csv file, it opens perfectly fine for me in Excel.

must be a problem with my Excel then. To me each cell contains:

Crown of the Twilight Queen,"False","Head","Burning Shadowspirit Diamond","Veiled Demonseye","","Arcanum of Hyjal","Found in Cache of the Broodmother in Heroic The Bastion of Twilight","60237","60237.0.68780.52217.0.4207.88.0","2192.125","2191.219","0.9071999"

Found the solution online, seems to be a file association problem.

"A work-around for this: Select the single column, then under the data menu there is a text to columns wizard. This will recognize the commas as a separator and restore
the multiple columns."

Thanks for the feedback
